title: riot dont want me moneys!!!
body:
in a shocking twist it would seem riot dont want my cold hard cash

everytime i try to buy rp i get this "you have exceeded the maximum number of attempts in 24 hours" message .... the last time i tried to buy rp was three days ago and i got the same thing.

how do i fix this.

replies.body:
This is from the Riot Games Support website regarding credit cards. You haven't specified what you are using but I hope it helps. I think the second paragraph might explain what you are experiencing and also includes a link to Player Support if you need it.

>As a security precaution, we have been forced to limit the amount of transactions attempts you can make within a day. Keep in mind that this applies for the amount of times the same credit card is used on various accounts AND the amount of times a single account uses various cards.

>If your credit card is being declined or if you are running into an error, restart your client and double check all of your credit card information before attempting again. Avoid making too many transaction attempts, as this may cause further issues with your store account. Please wait 24 hours before initiating another purchase. If you continue to experience this issue, please submit a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we will be happy to further investigate this issue.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753204-Credit-Card#h4q5
